Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.server.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.server.model.Board
public final class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Immutable class representing a two-dimensional Board game made by a one-dimensional list of TOTAL_CELLS cells in row major order.
Author:
Maximilien Groh (10683107)

    • Board

      public Board​(java.util.Set<Worker> workers, java.util.Set<Tower> towers, java.util.Set<Cell> cellsWithDomes) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Board constructor that creates a board with the given workers, towers and domes.
      Parameters:
      towers - set of towers present on the board
      workers - set of workers present on the board
      cellsWithDomes - set of domes present on the board
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if one of the arguments is null

  • Method Details

    • withTower

      public Board withTower​(Tower tower)
      Returns a copy of the board that contains the given tower or the same board if the argument is null
      Parameters:
      tower - the tower to place on the board
      Returns:
      a new board with the given cell

    • withWorker

      public Board withWorker​(Worker worker) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Returns a copy of the board that contains the given worker or the same board if the argument is null
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker to add
      Returns:
      a new board with the worker added
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • withoutWorker

      public Board withoutWorker​(Worker worker)
      Returns a copy of the board without the given worker or the same board if the argument is null or if the worker wasn't on the board
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker to remove
      Returns:
      a new board with the worker removed

    • withoutWorkers

      public Board withoutWorkers​(WorkerColor color)
      Returns a copy of the board without the workers of the specified color. If the color is null or if there are no workers of that color, the same board is returned.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the workers to be removed
      Returns:
      a new board with the workers removed

    • withoutTower

      Returns a copy of the board without the given tower or the same board if the argument is null or if the tower wasn't on the board
      Parameters:
      tower - the tower to remove
      Returns:
      a new board with the tower removed

    • withDome

      public Board withDome​(Cell cell)

      Parameters:
      cell - the cell at which the dome is placed
      Returns:
      a new board with the dome added

    • neighborOf

      public java.util.Optional<Cell> neighborOf​(Cell cell, Direction dir)
      Returns the neighbor of the given cell in the given direction if there is one, the empty optional value otherwise.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell of which we want to find the neighbor
      dir - the direction where the neighbor lies
      Returns:
      the neighbor of the given cell in the given direction if there is one, the empty optional value otherwise.

      Throws:
